page.title: 20THE NAZE CLIFFS
page.content: We measured the approximate height of the cliffs,we found that the cliff was roughly 57 metres high,at its highest point and then it decreased in height to the north-east and tilted away from the sea.Millions of years ago the Naze cliffs were under the sea.We can tell this by the evidence given,which is fossilised shells, sharks teeth and the soft crumbling sandstone.Over the last ten years people have been greatly concerned about the erosion of the cliffs by the wind,rain and sea. The extent of this erosion can be seen by studying historical postcards of the area.
